name: Academic painting
desc: The forged painting has a coffee stain on the top right whereas the genuine does not.

name: Amazing painting
desc: In the forged painting, the man with the red sash is not wearing a hat; whereas in the genuine painting, he is.

name: Basic painting
desc: In the forged painting, the boy has bangs covering his entire forehead; whereas in the genuine one, there is less hair covering his forehead.

name: Calm painting
desc: This painting is always authentic.

name: Common painting
desc: This painting is always authentic.

name: Dynamic painting
desc: This painting is always authentic.

name: Detailed painting
desc: The forged painting has purple flowers, whereas the genuine one has a blue flowers.

name: Famous painting
desc: In the forged painting, the woman has eyebrows which makes her look angry; whereas in the genuine one, she has no (or very faint) eyebrows which makes her look calm.

name: Glowing painting
desc: This painting is always authentic.

name: Flowery painting
desc: This painting is always authentic.

name: Graceful painting
desc: In the forged painting, the woman takes up most of the space and covers the stain on the painting; whereas in the genuine painting, she only takes up around two-thirds of the painting.

name: Jolly painting
desc: The forged painting is missing the artichoke bud sticking out of the chest, whereas the genuine one does.

name: Mysterious painting
desc: This painting is always authentic.

name: Moody painting
desc: This painting is always authentic.

name: Moving painting
desc: There are no trees in the forged painting, whereas the genuine one does.

name: Nice painting
desc: This painting is always authentic.

name: Perfect painting
desc: This painting is always authentic.

name: Proper painting
desc: This painting is always authentic.

name: Quaint painting
desc: In the forged painting, there is lots of milk pouring out of the container; whereas in the genuine one, there is only a small amount.

name: Scary painting
desc: In the forged painting, the man looks scared; whereas in the genuine one, he looks angry.

name: Scenic painting
desc: The forged painting has one person on the hill, whereas the genuine painting has three people and more dogs.

name: Serene painting
desc: In the forged painting, the stoat has a grey coloration; whereas in the genuine one, it is a white ermine.

name: Sinking painting
desc: This painting is always authentic.

name: Solemn painting
desc: In the forged painting, the man in the far back is pointing upwards; whereas in the genuine one, he is touching the wall.

name: Twinkling painting
desc: This painting is always authentic.

name: Warm painting
desc: This painting is always authentic.

name: Wild painting Left Half
desc: The forged painting has a dark figure, whereas the genuine one has a light figure.

name: Wild painting Right Half
desc: The forged painting has a light figure, whereas the genuine one has a dark figure.

name: Wistful painting
desc: In the forged painting, the woman is wearing a star-shaped earring; whereas in the genuine one, the earring is sphere-shaped.

name: Worthy painting
desc: This painting is always authentic.

name: Ancient statue
desc: The forged statue has antennae, whereas the genuine statue does not.

name: Beautiful statue
desc: The forged statue has a set of necklaces, whereas the genuine statue does not.

name: Familiar statue
desc: This statue is always authentic.

name: Gallant statue
desc: The forged statue holds a book in its right hand, whereas the genuine statue does not.

name: Great statue
desc: This statue is always authentic.

name: Informative statue
desc: The forged statue is blue, whereas the genuine one is grey.

name: Motherly statue
desc: The forged statue has its tongue sticking out, whereas the genuine one does not.

name: Mystic statue
desc: The forged statue has an earring, whereas the genuine statue does not.

name: Robust statue
desc: The forged statue is wearing a watch on its right arm, whereas the genuine statue is not.

name: Rock-head statue
desc: The forged statue is smiling, whereas the genuine one is not.

name: Tremendous statue
desc: The forged statue has a lid with a handle in the middle, whereas the genuine only has the handles on the side.

name: Valiant statue
desc: The forged statue is mirrored, with the left leg in front, whereas the genuine statue has the right leg in front.

name: Warrior statue
desc: The forged statue is holding a shovel, whereas the genuine one is not.
